titleText: Microsoft continues its 3D push with new Simplygon Cloud developer tools
mainText: Microsoft today debuted a new way to make 3D developers’ lives easier, taking advantage of an acquisition it made earlier this year. In January, Microsoft acquired Simplygon, a Swedish company that focused on 3D game optimization..
